Reviews.Title: Great Little TV
Reviews.Author: Alexander Hamilton
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV for a small room.  I have it in a bedroom and would rate the picture as a B+.  The sound does not allow for whisper quiet but this is a minor complaint.

ProductInfo.Features:
Viewable Screen Size 20 Diagonal with 4 - 3 Aspect ratio and Native/Optimum Resolution 640 x 480 for up to 16.7 Million colors
SDTV 480p @ 640 x 480
Contrast Ratio 400 - 1
Brightness 450 cd/m2
Color Gamut 75% NTSC
ProductInfo.Name: Westinghouse LTV-20V4 20" LCD Flat Panel Television
